titles: Englands standard advanced in Oxfordshire, or, A declaration from Mr. VVil. Thompson, and the oppressed people of this nation, now under his conduct in the said county. Dated at their randezvouz, May 6. 1649. Whereunto is added An agreement of the free people of England, as the grounds of their resolutions.
author: Thompson, William, d. 1649.
Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
notes: An expanded edition of "Englands standard advanced", published in the same year.
Includes a reprinting of: Lilburne, John.  An agreement of the free people of England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
